00010 #ifndef _FM_VECTOR3_H_

00021 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FMVector3
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     float x;    
00025     float y;    
00026     float z;    
00028 public:
00032     #ifndef _DEBUG
00033     FMVector3() {}
00034     #else
00035     FMVector3() { x = 123456789.0f; y = 123456789.0f; z = 123456789.0f; }
00036     #endif 
00037 
00045     FMVector3(float _x, float _y, float _z) { x = _x; y = _y; z = _z; }
00046 
00057     FMVector3(const float* source, uint32 startIndex = 0);
00058     FMVector3(const double* source, uint32 startIndex = 0); //See above
00059 
00062     inline float LengthSquared() const { return x * x + y * y + z * z; }
00063 
00066     inline float Length() const { return sqrtf(x * x + y * y + z * z); }
00067 
00069     inline void NormalizeIt() { float l = Length(); if (l > 0.0f) { x /= l; y /= l; z /= l; } else { x = y = 0; z = 1; }}
00070 
00073     inline FMVector3 Normalize() const { float l = Length(); return (l > 0.0f) ? FMVector3(x / l, y / l, z / l) : FMVector3::XAxis; }
00074 
00077     inline void Project(const FMVector3& unto) { (*this) = Projected(unto); }
00078 
00082     inline FMVector3 Projected(const FMVector3& unto) const;
00083 
00086     inline operator float*() { return &x; }
00087 
00090     inline operator const float*() const { return &x; }
00091 
00098     inline FMVector3& operator =(const float* v) { x = *v; y = *(v + 1); z = *(v + 2); return *this; }
00099 
00104     inline void ComponentMinimum(const FMVector3& min) { if (x < min.x) x = min.x; if (y < min.y) y = min.y; if (z < min.z) z = min.z; }
00105 
00108     inline float ComponentMinimum() const { return min(fabsf(x), min(fabsf(y), fabsf(z))); }
00109 
00114     inline void ComponentMaximum(const FMVector3& max) { if (x > max.x) x = max.x; if (y > max.y) y = max.y; if (z > max.z) z = max.z; }
00115 
00118     inline float ComponentMaximum() const { return max(fabsf(x), max(fabsf(y), fabsf(z))); }
00119 
00127     inline void ComponentClamp(const FMVector3& min, const FMVector3& max) { ComponentMinimum(min); ComponentMaximum(max); }
00128 
00131     inline float ComponentAverage() const { return (fabsf(x) + fabsf(y) + fabsf(z)) / 3.0f; }
00132 
00133 public:
00134     static const FMVector3 XAxis; 
00135     static const FMVector3 YAxis; 
00136     static const FMVector3 ZAxis; 
00137     static const FMVector3 Origin;
00138     static const FMVector3 Zero;  
00139     static const FMVector3 One;   
00140 };
00141 
00149 inline FMVector3 operator +(const FMVector3& a, const FMVector3& b) { return FMVector3(a.x + b.x, a.y + b.y, a.z + b.z); }
00150 
00158 inline FMVector3 operator -(const FMVector3& a, const FMVector3& b) { return FMVector3(a.x - b.x, a.y - b.y, a.z - b.z); }
00159 
00168 inline FMVector3 operator +(const FMVector3& a) { return FMVector3(+a.x, +a.y, +a.z); }
00169 
00178 inline FMVector3 operator -(const FMVector3& a) { return FMVector3(-a.x, -a.y, -a.z); }
00179 
00187 inline float operator *(const FMVector3& a, const FMVector3& b) { return a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y + a.z * b.z; }
00188 
00196 inline FMVector3 operator *(const FMVector3& a, float b) { return FMVector3(a.x * b, a.y * b, a.z * b); }
00197 
00205 inline FMVector3 operator *(float a, const FMVector3& b) { return FMVector3(a * b.x, a * b.y, a * b.z); }
00206 
00214 inline FMVector3 operator /(const FMVector3& a, float b) { return FMVector3(a.x / b, a.y / b, a.z / b); }
00215 
00223 inline FMVector3 operator ^(const FMVector3& a, const FMVector3& b) { return FMVector3(a.y * b.z - a.z * b.y, a.z * b.x - a.x * b.z, a.x * b.y - a.y * b.x); }
00224 
00232 inline FMVector3& operator +=(FMVector3& b, const FMVector3& a) { b.x += a.x; b.y += a.y; b.z += a.z; return b; }
00233 
00241 inline FMVector3& operator -=(FMVector3& b, const FMVector3& a) { b.x -= a.x; b.y -= a.y; b.z -= a.z; return b; }
00242 
00250 inline FMVector3& operator *=(FMVector3& b, float a) { b.x *= a; b.y *= a; b.z *= a; return b; }
00251 
00259 inline FMVector3& operator /=(FMVector3& b, float a) { b.x /= a; b.y /= a; b.z /= a; return b; }
00260 
00267 inline bool IsEquivalent(const FMVector3& p, const FMVector3& q) { return IsEquivalent(p.x, q.x) && IsEquivalent(p.y, q.y) && IsEquivalent(p.z, q.z); }
00268 
00275 inline bool operator == (const FMVector3& a, const FMVector3& b) { return IsEquivalent(a, b); }
00276 
00277 // Already documented above.
00278 inline FMVector3 FMVector3::Projected(const FMVector3& unto) const { return ((*this) * unto) / unto.LengthSquared() * unto; }

00281 typedef fm::vector<FMVector3> FMVector3List;
